name: Dotcolor - Color by numbers
description:
Dotcolor - Color by Numbers is a simple yet addictive puzzle game.

Pair all colors, and cover the entire board to solve each puzzle in
Dotcolor - Color by Numbers. But pipes will break if they cross or overlap!
Draw the line between the related number and connect them with line.

Dotcolor - Color by Numbers gameplay ranges from simple and relaxed, to challenging and frenetic, and everywhere in between. How you play is up to you. So, give
Dotcolor - Color by Numbers the Dot a try, and experience "Relaxing Lines"!

Draw Line features:

- free puzzles levels and Relaxing Lines
- Fun sound effects
- Clean, colorful graphics
-smooth display with many high color
